title: Is AIIMS Raipur better than GMC Bhopal and MGMMC Indore for an MBBS? - Quora
tags: All India Institute of Medical Sciences, Raipur
All India Institute of Medical Sciences (AIIMS)
Bachelor of Medicine and Bachelor of Surgery Degrees

response.answer_text: Definitely choose AIIMS Raipur ,the teaching staff & facilities are best which you can't get in atleast mp medical colleges. The infrastructure is new and state of art facilities like new Lecture Theatres and one of the Biggest library compared to other AIIMS( now opened till 2 'o clock midnight…soon to become 24×7). You get a good competitive atmosphere for further going for post graduate (MD/MS) exams. New Rooms,Free electricity, and very minimal fees of just Rs.5856 only once at the time of admission. Update:- Hospital infrastructure is almost complete except auditorium which will be completed by late 2019.
